Headline: Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near Lawndale/27th
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Central Park, 26th, and Lawndale due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Central Park, 26th, and Lawndale due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier loss of power at Dempster-Skokie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier loss of power at Dempster-Skokie. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
